page.title: 03Michelle Streffords Day 5yrs
page.content: {7.30} Wakened by mother {7.40} Wash and dress {8.00} Breakfast cereal and boiled egg & tea Watch TV and play with dolls {8.45} Car to school with Mum. {9.00} In school hang up coat sit on chair. {9.10} Assembly Sing hymn Listen to story Say prayers. {9.30} Copy writing from card. Read a page of book. {10.00} Play lotto game with six others {10.15}Drink 1/3 pint milk {10.30} Play out - skipping & hop scotch.{10.45} PE {11.15} Maths 2 pages Scottish Primary Maths book. {11.45} Counting and number rhymes. {12.00} School dinner {12.30} Play out {13.15} Painting and handwork {14.00} TV programme for schools You and Me then discussion {14.40} Play out {14.50} Story {15.25} Prayers and go home with Mum {15.45} Play in garden with friends {18.00}Teatime with Dad and Mum {18.40 Watch TV. {19.30}Bath time and then reading and so to bed.
